text: Good morning, everyone. Today is Wednesday, May 28th. Please make sure to submit your homework
by lunchtime. There will be a student council meeting after school in room 3A. Don't forget
to bring your notebooks. Also, congratulations to the soccer team for winning yesterday's game.
Let's all do our best today and help each other out. Keep your classroom tidy and remember to
recycle. Lunch today will be curry rice with salad and fruit. Teachers, please check the
attendance sheet by 9 a.m. Have a productive and positive day.
